title: FS:  Tobacco Card Wooden Boxes are back!
author: jp1216

posts.post_title: FS:  Tobacco Card Wooden Boxes are back!
posts.post_content:
Fresh batch of 'T206' Tobacco card wooden boxes are back!  Currently, 6 are in stock and ready to ship.  My father-in-law has sold over 2 dozen of these in the past couple years (mostly to Net54 members).  I PM'd just about everyone that has been requesting one for months.  A few have been sold already.
Net54 discount is set at $150 + $25 S/H = $175 via PayPal, MO, check.  International will be more.
PM me to place an order.
These are beautiful, cigar style boxes.  Please visit [url]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url] for more pictures and information.  
These hold about 525 'Ultra-Pro' tobacco top loaders.  Dividers can be removed to hold about 40 graded cards - see pictures.  Available with or without top logo.

A couple 'Graded' card boxes remain as well.

If the pictures don't load - please see the website.

[IMG]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com/uploads/6/1/2/8/6128218/6175214.jpg[/IMG]

Bump.
A couple are sold.  A few remain of the 'Graded' boxes also.  PM for details and the Net54 discount.
Price lowered on remaining boxes.  Please PM to get the discounted price.
A couple remain.  PM to reserve one today!
